full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement for Spatially Resolved Exposure Surfaces Development
## Request for Proposal (RFP) Details

- **Title (English)**: Development of Spatially Resolved Exposure Surfaces of PM2.5 Mass Component Concentrations under Intervention Scenarios
- **Title (French)**: Développement de surfaces d’exposition à résolution spatiale pour les PM2.5 dans le cadre de scénarios d’intervention
- **Reference Number (English)**: PW-22-01009148
- **Solicitation Number (English)**: 1000245801
- **Publication Date**: 2022-10-04
- **Closing Date**: 2022-11-03T14:00:00 (Expired)

## Contract Details
- **Academic Discipline**: Medical and Health Studies (B503A)
- **Procurement Category**: Services (SRV)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

## Project Description
Health Canada invites contractors to develop spatially resolved exposure surfaces of PM2.5 mass and seven major components for each year between 2007 and 2016 across Canada. These surfaces will be used in epidemiological analyses and health impact assessments.

## Tender Requirements
- The contractor must have expertise in developing spatially resolved exposure surfaces and analyzing major components of PM2.5.
- The contractor must be able to review and analyze database and data models.
- The contractor must be able to communicate and collaborate with Health Canada's scientific teams.

## Contracting Entity
- **Entity Name (English)**: Health Canada
- **Entity Address**: Address Locator 0900C2, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
- **Entity Contact**:
  - **Name:** Wesley Phillips
  - **Email:** wesley.phillips@canada.ca
  - **Phone:** 613-941-2067

## Attachment
The tender package, including the RFP and other supporting documents, is available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/04/090a249328d10ce04fdffeeef9221b9f/pr1000245801_rfp_final_english.docx](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/04/090a249328d10ce04fdffeeef9221b9f/pr1000245801_rfp_final_english.docx)
